Author: couldbemage
Text: I just bought some new clothing that fits better, and got a bunch of people astonished at my weight loss, even though I'm about ten pounds heavier than when they least saw me.

Author: might_be_alright
Text: what I imagine happened is, she saw your gradual changes, but didn't notice them because they were so gradual. so when you separated for the summer, she remembered you as you used to be(memory is very flexible!), and all that gradual change was lost, making it seem like an overnight change when seeing you in the flesh again
